dt: {bc}a person engaged in a fight to the death as public entertainment for ancient Romans
{bc}a person engaging in a public fight or controversy

et: Latin, from {it}gladius{/it} sword, of Celtic origin; akin to Welsh {it}cleddyf{/it} sword
shortdef: a person engaged in a fight to the death as public entertainment for ancient Romans
a person engaging in a public fight or controversy
a trained fighter; especially : a professional boxer
